headline: BURLEIGH XYZ  ROTARY WITH Z AXIS  BALANCED ROTARY STAGE
description: XYZ Rotary With Z Axis Balanced Rotary Stage
specstable:
Manufacturer Burleigh
Model TS-300Z
Description XYZ with Balanced Rotary Stage
Other Information

X Travel: 50mm
Y Travel: 50mm
Z Travel 50mm
Rotary stage travel: 360 Deg.
Rotary Z axis balanced stage travel: +- 15 degrees. (torsion spring balance)
Rotary Z axis stage aperture: 44mm
Rotary Z axis stage lense mount: 50mm diameter
Strightness: 1 micron
Max load: 1.5 Kg

Stage utilized Burliegh motorized linear actuators (Inch worm) actuators not included.

Exterior Dimensions
Width 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Depth 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Height 13.000 in (33.0 cm)
Weight 17 lb (8 kg)
